titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the annihilating of a former proclamation, intituled, A proclamation prohibiting the vntimely bringing in of vvines
Proclamations. 1619-09-02
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Bagshot the second day of September, in the seuenteenth yeere of our reigne ..
